p: To the Editor: At the end of 2019, an outbreak of novel coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19), caused by 2019-nCov, causing widespread novel coronavirus disease. This outbreak of COVID-19 occurred during the period of the 2020 Spring Festival in China, a period known for massive population movements within China. This has resulted in large numbers of infected patients as a consequence of multiple human contact episodes in individual travelers.
